section.name: Credits
section.p: EJBCA uses the opensource JCE crypto provider from The Legion of the Bouncy Castle.
Development and default deployment is done (primarily) using the JEE application server JBoss AS.

This product includes software developed by The Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/).
Ant
commons-collections
commons-fileupload
commons-lang
Tomcat
Xerces
log4j
Batik
XML Digital Signatures/XML Encryption
...
OpenLDAP is used to support LDAP directories.

Other softwares include:
JUnit
HttpUnit
Quickserver
Novosec BouncyCastle CMP extension
Java GNU IDN Library - Libidn
OpenTC Project, SASLprep patch the libidn library
